get.summary: Get the feeds for a certain location
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides the animal feeds for a location

200.description: Successful. The response contains the resources for the given location.

post.summary: Add a single new feed.
post.description:
# Purpose
Allows a client to add a single feed.

requestBody.description:
The feed to create. 
A client MAY fill in the *Id* field with a client-generated UUID and the server MAY use this *Id*.
If the server does not use the client-specified *ID* field it shall issue its own *ID* for the resource.
A client SHALL ensure that the *meta.source* and *meta.sourceId* fields are filled by the client.

200.description: Successful. The response contains a copy of the event, as modifed by the server.

201.description: Created. The Location header contains the URI to the new resource.

Location.description: Contains the URI to the new resource.

202.description: Accepted. The Location header contains a URI that the client can query for processing status.

Location.description: Contains a URI to query creation status.

id.description: Unique identifier in the source system for this resource.

category.description: The scheme and the id of the category of the feed.

type.description: The scheme and the id of the type of the feed. ICAR recommends the use of the list of the scheme org.fao

name.description: Name of the feed as it is known on the location.

active.description: indicates whether the feed is or was available on the location.

icarFeedCollection.description: Represents a collection of feeds. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case feeds.

id.description: Unique identifier in the source system for this resource.

name.description: Name of the feed as it is known on the location.

active.description: indicates whether the ration is or was available on the location.

icarRationCollection.description: Represents a collection of rations. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case rations.

icarFeedIntakeEventResource.description: Event for recording a feed intake

feedingStartingDateTime.description: The RFC3339 UTC moment the feeding started (see https://ijmacd.github.io/rfc3339-iso8601/ for format guidance).

consumedRation.description: The eventual ration that has been consumed

device.description: Optional information about the device used for the feeding.

icarFeedIntakeEventCollection.description: Represents a collection of feed intakes. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case feed intakes.

icarFeedRecommendationResource.description: An overview of the recommended feeding of animals

id.description: Unique identifier in the source system for this recommendation.

animal.description: Unique animal scheme and identifier combination.

recommendationDateTime.description: The RFC3339 UTC timestamp of the recommendation (see https://ijmacd.github.io/rfc3339-iso8601/ for format guidance).

startDateTime.description: The RFC3339 UTC date of the beginning of the recommendation (see https://ijmacd.github.io/rfc3339-iso8601/ for format guidance).

endDateTime.description: The RFC3339 UTC end date of the recommendation (see https://ijmacd.github.io/rfc3339-iso8601/ for format guidance).

icarFeedRecommendationCollection.description: Represents a collection of feed recommendations. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case feed recommendations.

icarFeedStorageResource.description: Describes the feed storage device on a certain location.

feedId.description: Unique identifier of the feed that is stored in this device.

capacity.description: The amount of feed that can be stored in this device.

quantityAvailable.description: The amount of feed that is currently stored in this device and is available for feeding.

icarFeedStorageCollection.description: Represents a collection of feed storage devices. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case feed storage devices.

icarFeedReportCollection.description: Represents a collection of feed reports. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case feed reports.

icarFeedTransactionResource.description: An inventory transaction resource for a feed product.

product.description: The feed product in this transaction.

icarFeedTransactionCollection.description: Represents a collection of feed inventory transactions. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case inventory transactions.

icarGroupFeedingEventResource.description: Event for recording group or mob feeding. Allowances represent averages so this cannot be used to populate individual animal events.

feedingEndDateTime.description: The RFC3339 UTC moment from which animals could no longer consume the feed (eventDateTime represents the start of feed availability).

items.description: Gives the feed offered to and consumed per animal (average).

feedTotal.description: Gives the feed offered to and consumed (total for all animals).

items.description: Gives the ration offered to and consumed per animal (average).

rationTotal.description: Gives the feed offered to and consumed (total for all animals).

device.description: Optional information about a device used for the feeding, if relevant.

icarGroupFeedingEventCollection.description: Represents a collection of feed intakes. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case group feeding events.

icarBatchResultSeverityType.description: Severity code to distinguish warnings and errors.

icarResponseMessageResource.description: An RFC7807 compliant problem response for JSON APIs.

type.description: Machine readable URI or code that defines the type of error or warning.

severity.description: Distinguish errors, warnings, and informational messages.

status.description: The HTTP status code applicable to this problem.

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem that SHOULD NOT change from occurrence to occurrence of the problem, except for purposes of localization.

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem. Like title, this fields value can be localized.

instance.description: A URI reference or internal JSON document reference to the specific data item that caused the problem.

icarErrorCollection.description: A collection of RFC7807 compliant problem responses for JSON APIs.

icarResourceCollection.description: Base class for a collection of items such as animals, devices, or events. Use allOf to add an items array of the right type.

view.description: Information about the current view or page of the collection

totalItems.description: Provides the number of items in the collection, if known.

totalPages.description: Provides the number of pages in the collection, if known.

pageSize.description: If non-zero, specifies the default number of items returned per page.

currentPage.description: Optionally identifies the current page for display purposes, if returned.

first.description: Link to the first page of the collection. Link relation: first.

next.description: Link to the next page of the collection, if any. Link relation: next.

prev.description: Link to the previous page of the collection, if any. Link relation: prev.

last.description: Link to the last page of the collection, if any. Link relation: last.

icarDateTimeType.description: A particular point in the progression of time. Shall be UTC format with Z, specified in RFC3339 (see https://ijmacd.github.io/rfc3339-iso8601/ for format guidance).

icarMetaDataType.description: Generic meta data on this event

source.description: Source where data is retrieved from. URI  or reverse DNS that identifies the source system.

sourceId.description:
Unique Id within Source (e.g. UUID, IRI, URI, or composite ID if needed) for the resource in the original source system. 
 Systems should generate (if needed), store, and return sourceId if at all possible.
ICAR ADE working group intend to make use of metadata, source and sourceId mandatory in the next major release (2.0).

isDeleted.description: Boolean value indicating if this resource has been deleted in the source system.

modified.description: RFC3339 UTC date/time of last modification (see https://ijmacd.github.io/rfc3339-iso8601/ for format guidance).

created.description: RFC3339 UTC date/time of creation (see https://ijmacd.github.io/rfc3339-iso8601/ for format guidance).

creator.description: Person or organisation who created the object

validFrom.description: RFC3339 UTC start of period when the resource is valid (see https://ijmacd.github.io/rfc3339-iso8601/ for format guidance).

validTo.description: RFC3339 UTC end of the period when the resoure is valid (see https://ijmacd.github.io/rfc3339-iso8601/ for format guidance).

id.description: A unique identification for the resource issued under the auspices of the scheme.

scheme.description: The identifier (in reverse domain format) of an official scheme that manages unique identifiers.

icarLocationIdentifierType.description: Location identifier based on a scheme and ID.

icarResource.description: Base class for a resource, defining self-link and meta data. Resources should use AllOf to incorporate this class.

resourceType.description: Uniform resource identifier (URI) or shortname of the logical resourceType. The ResourceType catalog defines the set of allowed resourceTypes.

@self.description: Uniform resource identifier (URI) of the resource (rel=self).

meta.description:
Meta-data for the resource. Mandatory if you wish to support synchronisation.
 Systems should maintain and provide meta data if at all possible.
ICAR ADE working group intend meta to be required in the next major release of ADE.

location.description: Unique location scheme and identifier combination.

icarFeedCategoryType.description: Enumeration for feed categories. Each category can have more detail in a type specification.

icarFeedIdentifierType.description: Provides a scheme + identifier mechanism for feed types (see location-scheme.md for the icar list for scheme fao.org).).

icarPropertyIdentifierType.description: Provides a scheme + identifier mechanism for feed properties (see location-scheme.md for the icar list for scheme icar.org).

uncefactMassUnitsType.description:
Mass units for weight from UN/CEFACT trade facilitation recommendation 20.
 Kilogram, Gram, Pound, Metric Tonne, Microgram, Miligram, Ounce, Pound net.

icarMethodType.description: Enumeration for the method with which a value was determined.

propertyIdentifier.description: identifies the property of the feed

units.description: Units specified in UN/CEFACT 3-letter form. Default if not specified is KGM.

method.description: The method to come to the value of the property

name.description: name of the property (used on the location).

icarFeedsInRationType.description: Feeds that are added to a specific ration.

percentage.description: the percentage of the feed in the ration.

icarTraitLabelIdentifierType.description: Trait identifier based on a scheme and ID.

icarEventCoreResource.description: Core schema for representing an event.

id.description: Unique identifier in the source system for this event.

traitLabel.description: If the event represents a formal trait, identifies the recording system and trait.

responsible.description: Use if an observation is manually recorded, or an event is carried out or authorised by a person. SHOULD be a person object.

contemporaryGroup.description: For manually recorded events, record any contemporary group code that would affect statistical analysis.

remark.description: A comment or remark field for additional user-specified information about the event.

icarAnimalIdentifierType.description: Identifies an animal using a scheme and ID.

icarAnimalEventCoreResource.description: Extends icarEventCoreResource to add a single individual animal identifier.

animal.description: Unique animal scheme and identifier combination.

icarFeedDurationType.description: The length in time of the feeding

unitCode.description: UN/CEFACT Common Code for Units of Measurement.

value.description: The duration of the feeding in the units specified.

unitCode.description: Units specified in UN/CEFACT 3-letter form. Default if not specified is KGM.

value.description: The feed quantity in the units specified.

currency.description: The currency of the cost expressed using the ISO 4217 3-character code (such as AUD, GBP, USD, EUR).

value.description: The costs in the units specified.

icarConsumedFeedType.description: gives the consumed feed and the amount the animal/group was entitled to. Amounts are real weights

feedId.description: The identifier for the feed consumed

entitlement.description: The amount of feed the animal/group was entitled to receive

delivered.description: The amount of feed the animal/group received. If not present, it can be assumed that the delivered will be equal to entitlement

feedConsumption.description: The amount of feed the animal/group has consumed

dryMatterPercentage.description: The dry matter content of the feed provided or consumed, expressed as a percentage.

totalCost.description: Total cost applied to this feeding. Based on the delivered or entitled amount

icarConsumedRationType.description: Gives the consumed amount of a mixed ration, and the amount the animal/group was entitled to. Amounts are real weights.

rationId.description: The identifier for the ration consumed

entitlement.description: The amount of feed the animal/group was entitled to receive

delivered.description: The amount of feed the animal/group received. If not present, it can be assumed that the delivered will be equal to entitlement

feedConsumption.description: The amount of feed the animal/group has consumed

dryMatterPercentage.description: The dry matter content of the ration provided or consumed, expressed as a percentage.

totalCost.description: Total cost applied to this feeding. Based on the delivered or entitled amount

icarResourceReferenceType.description: Defines a reference to another resource.

@context.description: Deprecated. Tells us the type of the referenced resource object (eg. icarAnimalCore).

@id.description: Deprecated - use href and identifier. Uniform resource idendentifier (URI) of the referenced resource.

@type.description: Deprecated - use reltype. Specifies whether this is a single resource Link or a Collection.

identifier.description: Provides the identifier of the referenced resource.

reltype.description: Defines the relationship between the current resource and the referenced resource. Defined in well-known/relationshipCatalog.md

href.description: Where provided, this is the URI to the referenced resource.

icarDeviceRegistrationIdentifierType.description: A device registration scheme and ID that identifies a registered device. The primary scheme used should be `org.icar`.

model.description: ICAR registered device model, which represents manufacturer, model, hardware and software versions.

serial.description: Optionally, the serial number of the device.

manufacturerName.description: The manufacturer of the device. This is called `manufacturerName` to distinguish it from the manufacturer-specific parameters in icarDevice.

registration.description: A registration identifier for the device (most devices should eventually have a registration issued by `org.icar` or other entity).

icarRecommendedFeedType.description: Gives the recommendation to be fed to an animal or group of animals of a certain feed.

feedId.description: The identifier for the feed recommended

entitlement.description: The amount of feed the animal is recommended to reveive

icarRecommendedRationType.description: Gives the recommendation to be fed to an animal or group of animals of a certain ration.

rationId.description: The identifier for the ration recommended

entitlement.description: The amount of this ration the animal is recommended to receive

icarFeedReportResource.description: Reporting the feed consumed during a certain time period

animals.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, animals provides the array of animals part of the feeding report. This could also be a report for one animal.

reportStartDateTime.description: The RFC3339 UTC moment the period of the reporting started (see https://ijmacd.github.io/rfc3339-iso8601/ for format guidance).

reportEndDateTime.description: The RFC3339 UTC moment the period of the reporting ended (see https://ijmacd.github.io/rfc3339-iso8601/ for format guidance).

icarMessageType.description: Enumeration of the ICAR messages. These can be used to identify supported capabilities or functions.

icarDeviceManufacturerType.description: Describes the devices on a certain location.

id.description: Unique id of the manufacturer. Domain name/url --> lely.com,

deviceType.description: A device type registered within the database proposed by the Sensor Working Group. This could be a UUID but we prefer a meaningful string.

deviceName.description: Name given to the device by the manufacturer.

deviceDescription.description: Description of the device by the manufacturer.

icarDeviceResource.description: This resource is used to describe an instance of a device at a location.

id.description: Unique identifier on location level in the source system for this device.

serial.description: Optionally, the serial number of the device.

name.description: Name given to the device by the farmer.

description.description: Description of the device by the farmer.

softwareVersion.description: Version of the software installed on the device.

hardwareVersion.description: Version of the hardware installed in the device.

isActive.description: Indicates whether the device is active at this moment.

supportedMessages.description: Identifies message types supported for the device

manufacturer.description: The device data as defined by the manufacturer.

registration.description: A registration identifier for the device (most devices should eventually have a registration issued by `org.icar` or other entity).

animal.description: If specified, contains the identifier of an animal that the device is currently associated with.

icarInventoryTransactionKindType.description: Defines the kinds of inventory transaction, which can represent items received, disposed of (including sale or destruction), used, counted in a stocktake or calculated on hand.

icarInventoryTransactionType.description: Inventory Transaction defines a transaction on a product inventory where the transaction may be a receipt, disposal, on hand, stocktake, use

quantity.description: The overall volume, weight or count of the product in the transaction in the units defined.

units.description: The units of the quantity specified.  Where applicable it is recommended that uncefact mass and volume units are used.

supplierName.description: The supplier of the product in this transaction.  This is particularly relevant if the transaction is a receipt.

expiryDate.description: The expiry date of the product supplied in the transaction.

totalCost.description: Total cost applied to this transaction

currency.description: The currency of the cost expressed using the ISO 4217 3-character code (such as AUD, GBP, USD, EUR).

packSize.description: The volume or weight of the product in a pack in the units defined. Especially relevant for Vet Medicines.

numberOfPacks.description: The number of packs of the product in the transaction. Especially relevant for Vet Medicines. Could be a decimal number for a part-pack.

icarProductIdentifierType.description: Provides a scheme + identifier mechanism for product types.

icarProductReferenceType.description: Product Reference refers to a specific product. It is based on the generalised resource reference type.

identifiers.description: An array of product identifiers. This allows a product to have multiple identifiers for manufacturers, distributors, official registrations, etc.

family.description: The product family to which this product belongs.

unspc.description: UN service and product code (the code, not the accompanying description).

icarFeedReferenceType.description: Feed Reference defines a feed product.

category.description: Defines the category of the feed product.

type.description: The scheme + id identifying the type of feed.

icarGroupEventMethodType.description: Defines how the set of animals in a group event is defined.

icarAnimalSpecieType.description: Enumeration for species of animal using English names. Previous ADE definitions used a mixture of English and Genus names.

icarAnimalGenderType.description: Enumeration for sex of animal using species-independent English names. Includes neuter/cryptorchid variations.

icarBreedIdentifierType.description: Identifies a breed using a scheme and ID. Allows country or species-specific breeds that are a superset of the ICAR list.

icarAnimalReproductionStatusType.description: Enumeration for different possible reproduction status of an animal.

icarAnimalLactationStatusType.description: Enumeration for different possible lactation status of an animal.

icarProductionPurposeType.description:
Defines the primary product that for which this animal is bred or kept.
If animals are kept for breeding or live trade (sale), specify the end purpose of that breeding/trade.

 - Meat corresponds to UNSPC 50111500 Minimally processed meat and poultry products
 - Milk corresponds to UNSPC 50203200 Raw milk products from live animals
 - Wool corresponds to UNSPC 11131506 Unprocessed wool.
 Suckler - used to breastfeed calves.
 Breeding - bulls used for semen production.

icarInventoryClassificationType.description: This type is used to categorise animals by shared characteristics - so you can say the equivalent of 200 x 2-year-old in-calf Jersey heifers.

name.description: Human-readable name for this inventory grouping.

count.description: The count or number of animals in this inventory classification.

primaryBreed.description: Primary breed defined using an identifier and scheme.

birthPeriod.description: The range of birth dates. Use YYYY (all one year), YYYY-MM (one month), or two RFC3339 date-times separated by / to represent a range.

reference.description: An external reference (identifier or name) to further identify the group of animals.

icarSetPurposeType.description: Describes the purpose of a set of animals.

icarAnimalSetResource.description: Core schema for representing animal sets (often called groups or sessions).

id.description: Unique identifier in the source system for this animal set.

name.description: Human readable name of the set.

reference.description: This property can be used by parties for any other reference information used to synchronise systems or display to the user.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case animals assigned to the set.

icarAnimalSetReferenceType.description: References an animal set through its unique ID in the source system, optionally also specifying its URL (@ID).

icarGroupEventCoreResource.description: Extends icarEventCoreResource to support event observations on groups of animals.

groupMethod.description: Indicates whether the event references an existing animal set, has an embedded animal set, or an inventory classification.

countObserved.description: Summarises the number of animals observed in the event. Generally the number of animals in the group, but sometimes a sample.

inventoryClassification.description: Describe the group of animals by their characteristics rather than animal identifiers.

embeddedAnimalSet.description: Specifies the set of animals as a list of member animal identifiers.

animalSetReference.description: Reference an existing animal set by ID and optionally URI

icarBatchResult.description: Returned by a batch POST event to return identity (meta), errors, and warnings for a resource.

id.description: Unique identifier created in the system for this event. SHOULD be a UUID.

meta.description: Metadata for the posted resource. Allows specification of the source, source Id to synchronise data.

messages.description: An array of errors for this resource. The messages array may be unspecified OR null.

icarDiagnosisEventCollection.description: Represents a collection of animal health diagnosis events. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case diagnosis events.

icarTreatmentEventCollection.description: Represents a collection of animal health treatment events. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case treatment events.

icarGroupTreatmentEventCollection.description: Represents a collection of group health treatment events. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: Provides the array of objects, in this case weighing events.

icarTreatmentProgramEventCollection.description: Represents a collection of animal health treatment program events. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case treatment program events.

icarHealthStatusObservedEventCollection.description: Represents a collection of animal health status observation events. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case lactation status events.

icarMedicineTransactionResource.description: An inventory transaction resource for a medicine product.

product.description: The medicine product in this transaction.

icarMedicineTransactionCollection.description: Represents a collection of medicine inventory transactions. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case inventory transactions.

icarAttentionEventResource.description: Defines an alert for an animal that may require attention.

alertEndDateTime.description: RFC3339 date time that represents the end time of an alert (start time is the eventDateTime) if it has ended.

category.description: A category that allows filtering of alerts by subject.

causes.description: The specific causes of the alert. This is an array and at least one cause must be specified.

priority.description: The relative priority of the alert.

severity.description: A structured set of severity values that align with those used in disease diagnosis.

deviceAttentionScore.description: Provides a manufacturer- and device-specific score related to the alert.

device.description: Identifies the device that is raising the alert.

icarAttentionEventCollection.description: Represents a collection of attention events generated by devices. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case attention events.

icarDiagnosisIdentifierType.description: Provides a scheme + identifier mechanism for diagnosis codes (e.g. VENOM or ICAR coding).

icarDiagnosisStageType.description: Enumeration for stage of disease diagnosis.

icarDiagnosisSeverityType.description: Enumeration for clinical severity of disease diagnosis.

icarPositionOnAnimalType.description: Enumeration for the position on the animal where the diagnosis or treatment occurred.

icarPositionType.description: The possible positions for treatment or diagnosis

position.description: Position on the animal where the diagnosis or treatment occurred.

icarDiagnosisType.description: Provides properties for a single animal health diagnosis.

id.description: Unique identifier for this diagnosis.

name.description: Name indicating the health condition diagnosed.

description.description: Description of the diagnosis or problem.

diagnosisCode.description: Descibes the scheme (eg venom or ICAR) and the code (ID) within that scheme.

site.description: Site on the animal involved in the diagnosis or disease.

stage.description: Identifies the clinical stage of disease progression.

severity.description: Identifies the clinical severity of the problem.

severityScore.description: Clinical severity expressed as a numeric score for systems that record this.

icarDiagnosisEventResource.description: A standalone diagnosis of one or more animal health conditions.

diagnoses.description: Diagnosis of the animal health condition. An array allows for several conditions to be recorded at once.

icarMedicineIdentifierType.description: Identifies a medicine registraton with a national Scheme and a registered ID within that scheme.

icarMedicineReferenceType.description: Provides basic details about a medicine and links to a medicine resource (if available).

approved.description: An indicator whether the medicine or remedy is an approved medicine

registeredIdentifier.description: The registered identifier of the medicine expressed as a scheme and id.

icarMedicineBatchType.description: Defines a batch of medicine or product with an expiry date.

identifier.description: The ID, batch or lot number.

expiryDate.description: The RFC3339 UTC expiry date of the batch (see https://ijmacd.github.io/rfc3339-iso8601/ for format guidance).

icarWithdrawalProductType.description: Categorises the types of products to which withdrawal periods may apply. These categories are generalised from NOAH/ACVM/FDA/Codex Alimentus.

productType.description: Product or food item affected by this withdrawal.

endDate.description: RFC3339 UTC end date of withdrawal calculated based on treatment date and medicine rules (see https://ijmacd.github.io/rfc3339-iso8601/ for format guidance).

market.description: The market to which the withdrawal applies, using a scheme such as au.gov.apvma.esi or au.gov.apvma.whp

uncefactDoseUnitsType.description:
Subset of units that are helpful for medicine doses from UN/CEFACT trade facilitation recommendation 20.
See https://unece.org/trade/uncefact/cl-recommendations#ui-id-17

icarMedicineDoseType.description: Provides details of a dose of medicine or other product.

doseQuantity.description: Quantity of medicine or product administered.

doseUnits.description: Units of measurement in UN/CEFACT 3-letter form

icarTreatmentEventResource.description: Defines a single animal health treatment, which may be medication or procedure.

medicine.description: A reference to the medicine used (where applicable).

procedure.description: Medicine application method or a non-medicine procedure.

batches.description: Batches and expiry details for the medicine administered.

withdrawals.description: Withholding details for the treatment administered.

site.description: Body site where the treatment was administered.

comment.description: A comment recorded about the treatment or its outcome.

icarGroupTreatmentEventResource.description: Defines a health treatment applied to a group of animals.

medicine.description: A reference to the medicine used (where applicable).

procedure.description: Medicine application method or a non-medicine procedure.

batches.description: Batches and expiry details for the medicine administered.

withdrawals.description: Withholding details for the treatment administered.

dosePerAnimal.description: The actual or average medicine dose administered per animal.

totalMedicineUsed.description: The total amount of medicine used.

site.description: Body site where the treatment was administered.

icarMedicineCourseSummaryType.description: Describes a course of treatment with total product, start and end dates

startDate.description: RFC3339 UTC start date of the treatment course (see https://ijmacd.github.io/rfc3339-iso8601/ for format guidance)

endDate.description: RFC3339 UTC End date of the treatment course (see https://ijmacd.github.io/rfc3339-iso8601/ for format guidance)

medicine.description: Medicine details used in the course.

procedure.description: Medicine application method or non-medicine procedure.

site.description: Body site where the treatment or procedure was administered.

reasonForAdministration.description: This attribute can be used when medicine has been administered without a diagnosis

numberOfTreatments.description: The number of treatments included in the course.

treatmentInterval.description: The interval between treatments specified in HOURS.

batches.description: Batches and expiry details of the medicine (there may be several).

planOrActual.description: Indicator showing if the attributes in the course Summary are actual information for the treatments or the plan

withdrawals.description: Provides withholding details for the treatment administered

icarTreatmentProgramEventResource.description: An animal health event combining diagnosis and planned or actual treatment course or events.

diagnoses.description: Decribes the diagnosis of one or more conditions

courses.description: Details the course of treatments at a summary (start and end date) level. The array allows for different medicines/procedures.

treatments.description: The list of the treatments (medicines or procedures) applied.

icarAnimalHealthStatusType.description: Defines the health-status of the animal.

icarHealthStatusObservedEventResource.description: Event for recording animal health status

observedStatus.description: Health status of the animal (such as Healthy, Suspicious, Ill, InTreatment, ToBeCulled). A null value is not supported.

icarAttentionCategoryType.description: Defines a category of device messages that may allow filtering of alerts.

icarAttentionCauseType.description: Defines causes of alerts from devices.

icarAttentionPriorityType.description: Defines the relative priority of alerts.

icarAnimalSetCollection.description: Represents a collection of animal sets. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case animal sets.

icarAnimalSetJoinEventResource.description: The animal set join event records animals joining animal set resources, i.e. additions of animals to a set.

animalSetId.description: Unique identifier in the source system for the animal set to be joined.

icarAnimalSetJoinEventCollection.description: Represents a collection of animal set join events. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case animal set join events.

icarAnimalSetLeaveEventResource.description: The animal set leave event records animals leaving animal set resources, i.e. removals of animals from a set.

animalSetId.description: Unique identifier in the source system for the animal set to be left.

icarAnimalSetLeaveEventCollection.description: Represents a collection of animal set leave events. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case animal set leave events.

icarDeviceCollection.description: Represents a collection of devices. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case weight events.

icarStatisticsCollection.description: Represents a collection of statistics. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case statistics.

icarInventoryTransactionResource.description: Generic inventory transaction resource.  Some product families have specific transaction resources (e.g. medicines, feeds).

product.description: The product in this inventory transaction.

icarInventoryTransactionCollection.description: Represents a collection of inventory transactions. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case inventory transactions.

icarGroupPositionObservationEventResourc.description: This event records that a group of animals was observed in a specific position or location (either a named location or a geographic coordinate).

icarGroupPositionObservationEventCollect.description: Represents a collection of group position observation events.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case group position observation events.

icarPositionObservationEventResource.description: This event records that an animal was observed in a specific position or location (either a named location or a geographic coordinate).

icarPositionObservationEventCollection.description: Represents a collection of animal position observation events.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case position observation events.

icarRemarkEventResource.description: This event resource is used to record a note or remark made by a farmer or other person.

note.description:
Unstructured, human-readable note or remark about the animal.
Consider using `responsible` to identify the person who recorded it.

icarRemarkEventCollection.description: Represents a collection of remark (or note) events. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case remark events.

icarObservationSummaryResource.description: This resource (not an event) is delivered on request to summarise observations for an animal over a time period.

animal.description: Unique animal scheme and identifier combination.

statistics.description: The summary statistics for this animal. Likely to be summarised on demand based on query parameters.

icarObservationSummaryCollection.description: Represents a collection of observation summary statistics. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case observation summary statistics.

icarStatisticsPurposeType.description: The kind or purpose of the statistics provided (can be expanded).

icarGroupType.description: The type of group for which statistics are provided (can be expanded).

icarGroupSpecifierType.description: definition of the groups for which statistics are provided. None of these are mandatory and can be used when convenient.

lactationNumberRangeMin.description: minimum number of lactations for the animals in the group.

lactationNumberRangeMax.description: maximum number of lactations for the animals in the group.

daysInMilkRangeMin.description: minimum number of days in milk for the animals in the group.

daysInMilkRangeMax.description: maximum number of days in milk for the animals in the group.

animalSetId.description: Unique identifier in the source system for this animal set.

icarMetricType.description: Identifies a metric using a scheme and ID. Allows country or species-specific metrics that are a superset of the ICAR list.

icarAggregationType.description: The type of aggregation. In addition to obvious statistical terms, Range is the difference between min and max, and index is a computed index value.

icarStatisticsType.description: The statistics that have been calculated.

metric.description: The metric code for a specific statistics. See https://github.com/adewg/ICAR/wiki/Schemes for more info

unit.description: The unit of the metric. This must be appropriate to the metric and UN-CEFACT unit codes should be used where possible.

aggregation.description: The aggregation applied to the metric.

icarStatisticsGroupType.description: definition of the groups for which statistics are provided

denominator.description: Number of animals in the group.

icarGroupSpecifier.description: A set of group specifiers that in combination define the animals in the group.

statistics.description: An array of statistics for this group.

icarStatisticsResource.description: Describes the statistics for a certain location.

id.description: Unique identifier on location level in the source system for this statistics.

location.description: Unique location scheme and identifier combination.

purpose.description: Defines the purpose for these statistics.

dateFrom.description: The start of the period for which statistics are calculated.

dateTo.description: The end of the period for which statistics are calculated.

group.description: An array of groups for which statistics are calculated, each of which has statistics for that group.

icarPositionObservationType.description: This type may be included in a position observation event to identify either a named position (such as a barn or pen) or a geographic location.

positionName.description: The name of a location, such as a barn, pen, building, or field.

site.description: Identifier for a sorting site (icarSortingSiteResource) for this position.

geometry.description: A GeoJSON geometry (such as a latitude/longitude point) that specifies the position.

icarDurationType.description:
ISO8601 durations used in aggregations:
 (1 day - typically from midnight, 1 hour, 24 hour period, 96 hour period, 1 week, 1 month)

icarObservationStatisticsType.description: Aggregated statistics for a animal behaviour or similar observation over a time period.

startDateTime.description: The start date/time of the aggregation period for this particular statistic.

duration.description: The type of period duration (e.g. 1D, 24H, 1W). A call may return statistics with different durations.

isIncomplete.description: This flag is present with the value true, when there is insufficient or incomplete data in the duration.

milkingStartingDateTime.description: The RFC3339 UTC date time of the start of milking (see https://ijmacd.github.io/rfc3339-iso8601/ for format guidance).

milkingType.description: This code allows organisations to distinguish between manual and automated milking.

milkingMilkWeight.description: A certified milking weight that complies with the ICAR guidelines.

milkingComplete.description: indication whether this milking was completed normally.

milkingParlourUnit.description: The milking parlour unit where the milking took place.

milkingBoxNumber.description: The milking box number where the milking took place.

milkingDeviceId.description: The ID of the device where the milking took place.

measureDeviceId.description: The ID of the device where the measurement of the milking took place

milkingShiftLocalStartDate.description: The ISO8601 date in local time zone to which this milking shift belongs. A time component is not expected or required.

milkingShiftNumber.description: For milkings supervised by humans, this number represents the shift within a local date in which this milking visit occurred.

quarterMilkings.description: A set of milking results for up to four quarters in dairy cows, or two teats for sheep or goats.

animalMilkingSample.description: An array of zero or more sample/bottle details if the animal is milk tested at this milking.

milkCharacteristics.description: An array of milk characteristics other than certified milk weight. See icarMilkCharacteristicsType for documentation.

icarMilkingVisitEventCollection.description: Represents a collection of animal milking visit events. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case milking visit events.

icarTestDayResource.description: Information about test day for milk sampling.

id.description: Unique identifier for this test day.

beginDate.description: The RFC3339 UTC datetime of the beginning of the milk sampling (see https://ijmacd.github.io/rfc3339-iso8601/ for format guidance).

endDate.description: The RFC3339 UTC datetime of the end of the milk sampling (see https://ijmacd.github.io/rfc3339-iso8601/ for format guidance).

icarTestDayCollection.description: Represents a collection of test days. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case test days.

icarTestDayResultEventResource.description: Event for representing test day result

icarTestDayResultEventCollection.description: Represents a collection of test day result events. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case test day result events.

icarDailyMilkingAveragesCollection.description: Represents a collection of daily milking averages per animal. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case test day result events.

icarMilkPredictionsCollection.description: Represents a collection of milk predictions per animal. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case milk prediction events.

icarLactationCollection.description: Represents a collection of lactations. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case lactations.

icarLactationStatusObservedEventResource.description: This event records an observed lactation status without necessarily a parturition, drying off, or other event.

observedStatus.description: The lactation status at the time of observation.

icarLactationStatusObservedEventCollecti.description: Represents a collection of animal lactation status observation events. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case lactation status events.

icarWithdrawalEventCollection.description: Represents a collection of withdrawals. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case lactation status events.

icarMilkDurationType.description: The length in time of the milking

unitCode.description: UN/CEFACT Common Code for Units of Measurement.

icarMilkingTypeCode.description: The type of milking (manual or automated)

unitCode.description: UN/CEFACT Common Code for Units of Measurement.

icarBottleIdentifierType.description: The type of bottle identifiertype according to ICAR_BottleIdentifierCode

icarValidSampleFillingIndicatorType.description: Validity of sample based on milk volume: 0=success (>80% expected milk), 1=incomplete (< 20% expected milk), 2=completed (with between 20-80% expected milk).

bottleIdentifierType.description: The type of bottle identifiertype according to ICAR_BottleIdentifierCode

bottlePosition.description: Position of the bottle in the sample rack

bottleIdentifier.description: Bottle identifier read from barcode or RFID

validSampleFillingIndicator.description: Indicator of valid sample filling according to ICAR_ValidSampleFillingIndicatorCode list

operator.description: The operator that took the sample

characteristic.description: Treat this field as an enum, with the list and units in https://github.com/adewg/ICAR/blob/ADE-1/enums/icarMilkCharacteristicCodeType.json.

value.description: the value of the characteristic measured

unit.description: Use the units for characteristics in https://github.com/adewg/ICAR/blob/ADE-1/enums/icarMilkCharacteristicCodeType.json. Only override when your units for a characteristic are different. Use UN/CEFACT codes.

measuringDevice.description: a more readable device class ID that contains manufacturer, device, hardware and software versions in a way that is similar to the USB specification. This will need more investigation.

icarQuarterId.description: the unique id of the quarter milking

xposition.description: Optional milking robot X position. Vendors may choose not to provide this.

yposition.description: Optional milking robot Y position. Vendors may choose not to provide this.

zposition.description: Optional milking robot Z position. Vendors may choose not to provide this.

bottleIdentifierType.description: The type of bottle identifiertype according to ICAR_BottleIdentifierCode

bottlePosition.description: Position of the bottle in the sample rack

bottleIdentifier.description: Bottle identifier read from barcode or RFID

validSampleFillingIndicator.description: Indicator of valid sample filling according to ICAR_ValidSampleFillingIndicatorCode list

operator.description: The operator that took the sample

icarTestDayCodeType.description: The test day code, indicating a status of the cow on the test day.

icarMilkingPredictionType.description: The amount of milk, fat and protein milked in a defined period of time

hours.description: The number of hours in which the mentioned milk, fat and protein were produced. Most commonly used is a 24 hours production.

unitCode.description: UN/CEFACT Common Code for Units of Measurement.

icarDailyMilkingAveragesResource.description: Resource containing daily averages calculated from milking visit of a single animal

id.description: Unique identifier in the source system for this event.

animal.description: Unique animal scheme and identifier combination.

averageDate.description: The date on which the average has been calculated.

milkYieldAvg24h.description: The average-amount of milk produced within 24h.

milkYieldAvg7days.description: The average-amount of milk produced within 7 days.

icarMilkPredictionResource.description: This returns a prediction of the expected milk, fat and protein for a cow for the remaining the lactation. A prediction of this production on the next testday is included and it also gives indication of when the peak production is reached. The eventDateTime for this event is the date of the prediction is made.

daysInMilkAtLactationPeak.description: The days in milk in a lactation when the peak production is expected to occur.

icarMilkRecordingProtocolType.description: Enumeration for the milk recording protocol.

icarMilkRecordingSchemeType.description: Enumeration for the milk recording scheme

icarMilkingsPerDayType.description: Enumeration for the milkings per day.

icarMilkSamplingSchemeType.description: Enumeration for the different milk sampling schemes.

icarMilkSamplingMomentType.description: Enumeration for different possible milk sampling moments.

icarMilkingType.description: Enumeration for different possible types of milking.

milkRecordingProtocol.description: Protocol A: Official MRO representative, Protocol B: Herd owner or its nominee, Protocol C: Official MRO representative or herd owner or its nominee.

milkRecordingScheme.description: all milkings at testday, all milkings in period, one milking at testday.

milkingsPerDay.description: 1 per day, 2, 3, 4, Continuous Milkings (e.g. robotic milking).

milkSamplingScheme.description: proportional size sampling of all milkings, constant size sampling of all milkings, sampling of one milking at alternating moments (Alternative Sampling), sampling of one milking at the same moments (Corrected Sampling), sampling of one milking at changing moments (AMS), sampling of multiple milkings at changing moments (AMS).

recordingInterval.description: A number in days of the interval between milk recordings. In case of e.g.4 weeks, use 30.

milkSamplingMoment.description: Composite = composite sample from morning and evening, Morning, Evening.

icarCertified.description: indicates whether this information is certified by ICAR

milkingType.description: Official milk result supplied by milk recording organisation, Measure by ICAR approved equipment, Measure by not approved equipment

id.description: Unique identifier in the source system for this event.

animal.description: Unique animal scheme and identifier combination.

beginDate.description: The RFC3339 UTC date of the beginning of the lactation (see https://ijmacd.github.io/rfc3339-iso8601/ for format guidance).

endDate.description: The RFC3339 UTC end date of the the lactation. This occurs when the animal is dried off, dies or calves again.

parity.description: The parity of the animal during this lactation.

lactationLength.description: The length of the lactation until this moment.

milkAmount.description: The amount of milk produced in this lactation.

fatAmount.description: The amount of fat produced in this lactation.

proteinAmount.description: The amount of protein produced in this lactation.

lactosisAmount.description: The amount of lactosis produced in this lactation.

lastTestDay.description: The RCF3339 UTC date of the last test day in the lactation (see https://ijmacd.github.io/rfc3339-iso8601/ for format guidance).

lactationType.description: This type of lactation based on lactation length that is delivered.

icarWithdrawalEventResource.description: A withdrawal resource used to indicate that product should be separated (e.g. colostrum from newly lactating cows).

productType.description: Product or food item affected by this withdrawal.

icarWeightEventResource.description: The Weight event records a live weight observation of an animal.

weight.description: The weight measurement, including units and resolution.

device.description: Optional information about the device used for the measurement.

timeOffFeed.description: Hours of curfew or withholding feed prior to weighing to standardise gut fill.

icarWeightEventCollection.description: Represents a collection of animal weight events. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case weight events.

icarGroupWeightEventResource.description: The Group Weight event records liveweight observations for a group of animals

units.description: Units specified in UN/CEFACT 3-letter form. Default if not specified is KGM.

method.description: The method of observation. Loadcell is the default if not specified.

resolution.description: The smallest measurement difference that can be discriminated given the current device settings. Specified in Units, for instance 0.5 (kilograms).

animalWeights.description: Array of animal id and weight pairs for animals in the event.

statistics.description: Array of weight statistics, namely average, sum, min, max, count, stdev

device.description: Optional information about the device used for the measurement.

timeOffFeed.description: Hours of curfew or withholding feed prior to weighing to standardise gut fill.

icarGroupWeightEventCollection.description: Represents a collection of group weighing events. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: Provides the array of objects, in this case weighing events.

icarBreedingValueCollection.description: Represents a collection of breeding values. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case breeding values.

icarTypeClassificationEventResource.description: Event for recording a type classification consisting of a set of conformation scores

icarTypeClassificationEventCollection.description: Represents a collection of type classifications. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case type classification events.

icarConformationScoreEventCollection.description: Represents a collection of animal conformation scores. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case conformation score events.

icarWeightMethodType.description:
Method by which the weight is observed.
 Includes loadcell (loadbars), girth (tape), assessed (visually), walk-over weighing, 
prediction, imaging (camera/IR), front end weight correlated to whole body, group average (pen/sample weigh).

icarMassMeasureType.description: Defines a mass or weight measurement type that can be used in events or other resources.

measurement.description: The weight observation, in the units specified (usually kilograms).

units.description: Units specified in UN/CEFACT 3-letter form. Default if not specified is KGM.

method.description: The method of observation. Loadcell is the default if not specified.

resolution.description: The smallest measurement difference that can be discriminated given the current device settings. Specified in Units, for instance 0.5 (kilograms).

icarIndividualWeightType.description: The Animal-Weight entity records a liveweight for an individual animal in a Group Weight. Either animal or weight may be null.

animal.description: Unique animal scheme and identifier combination.

icarBVBaseIdentifierType.description: Breeding value base identifier based on a scheme and ID.

icarBreedingValueCalculationType.description: Enumeration for identifying the mathematical calculation method used to calculate breeding values.

traitLabel.description: The scheme and id of the trait for which a breeding value is calculated

calculationType.description: Indicates the calculation method/type for the breeding value.

reliability.description: The reliability of the breeding value

resolution.description: The smallest difference that is relevant for this breeding value (to guide display). To assist in the interpretation of floating point values.

id.description: Unique identifier in the source system for this event.

animal.description: Unique animal scheme and identifier combination.

base.description: The scheme and the id of the base of the breeding value.

version.description: string which sets the version for the breeding value estimation - this can be a date, or a version name, or something the calculation center is using to identify their seperate runs.

icarConformationTraitGroupType.description: Enumeration for the type of trait.

icarConformationTraitType.description: The type of conformation trait according to ICAR guidelines

traitGroup.description: Defines whether the trait is a composite trait or a linear trait.

score.description: Conformation score with values of 1 to 9 numeric in case of linear traits and for composites in most cases between 50 and 99

traitScored.description: Scored conformation trait type according ICAR guidelines. See https://www.icar.org/Guidelines/05-Conformation-Recording.pdf

device.description: Optional information about the device used for the automated scoring.

icarLocationCollection.description: Represents a collection of locations. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case locations.

icarAnimalCoreCollection.description: Represents a collection of animals. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case animals.

icarMovementBirthEventCollection.description: Represents a collection of animal birth events. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case birth events.

icarGroupMovementBirthEventCollection.description: Represents a collection of group animal registration (birth) events. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: Provides the array of objects, in this case birth events.

icarMovementDeathEventCollection.description: Represents a collection of animal death events. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case death events.

icarGroupMovementDeathEventCollection.description: Represents a collection of group death events. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: Provides the array of objects, in this case death events.

icarMovementArrivalEventCollection.description: Represents a collection of animal arrival events. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case arrival events.

icarGroupMovementArrivalEventCollection.description: Represents a collection of group arrival events. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: Provides the array of objects, in this case arrival events.

icarMovementDepartureEventCollection.description: Represents a collection of animal departure events. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case departure events.

icarGroupMovementDepartureEventCollectio.description: Represents a collection of group departure events. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: Provides the array of objects, in this case departure events.

identifier.description: Unique animal scheme and identifier combination.

status.description: On-farm status of the animal (such as alive, dead, off-farm).

registrationReason.description: Identifies whether this is a birth or a registration event

animalDetail.description: Core animal details.  Can be used if the animal has not already been defined on the holding.

icarGroupMovementBirthEventResource.description: Extends icarGroupEventCoreResource to provide a group animal registration event (named Birth for consistency only).

registrationReason.description: Identifies whether this is a birth or registration event

icarMovementDeathEventResource.description: Event for recording animal death on farm.

deathReason.description: Coded reasons for death including disease, parturition complications, consumption by humans or animals.

explanation.description: Free text explanation of the reason for death.

disposalMethod.description: Coded disposal methods including approved service, consumption by humans or animals, etc.

disposalOperator.description: Disposal operator official name (should really be schema.org/organization).

disposalReference.description: Reference (receipt, docket, or ID) for disposal.

consignment.description: Identifies the consignment of the animal from the holding.

deathMethod.description: Defines the method of death, including an accident, natural causes, or euthanised.

extendedReasons.description: Extended reason codes why this animal has died.

icarGroupMovementDeathEventResource.description: Extends icarGroupEventCoreResource to provide a group death event.

deathreason.description: Coded reason for death - this is the CAUSE, compared to the MEANS.

explanation.description: Free text explanation of the reason for death.

disposalMethod.description: Coded disposal methods including approved service, consumption by humans or animals, etc.

disposalOperator.description: Disposal operator official name (should really be schema.org/organization).

disposalReference.description: Reference (receipt, docket, or ID) for disposal.

consignment.description: Where disposal is by transport, a consignment record may be required.

deathMethod.description: Defines the MEANS of death, including an accident, natural causes, or euthanised.

arrivalReason.description: Reason the animal arrived on the holding.

animalDetail.description: Core animal details. Can be used if the animal has not already been defined on the holding.

consignment.description: Identifies the consignment of the animal to the holding.

icarGroupMovementArrivalEventResource.description: Extends icarGroupEventCoreResource to provide a group movement arrival event.

arrivalReason.description: Reason the group of animals arrived on the holding.

consignment.description: Identifies the consignment of the group of animals to the holding.

icarMovementDepartureEventResource.description: Event for recording live animal departure.

departureKind.description: Identifies the kind of departure of the animal from the holding.

departureReason.description: Identifies the reason for the departure of the animal from the holding.

consignment.description: Identifies the consignment of the animal from the holding.

extendedReasons.description: Extended reason codes why this animal has departed.

icarGroupMovementDepartureEventResource.description: Extends icarGroupEventCoreResource to provide a group movement departure event.

departureKind.description: Coded description of the type of departure (e.g. sale, agistment, other).

departureReason.description: Coded description of the reason why the animals are departing.

consignment.description: Consignment information about origin, destination, and transport.

icarLocationResource.description: A location scheme / location id combination.

identifier.description: Unique location scheme and identifier combination.

alternativeIdentifiers.description: Alternative identifiers for the location. Must be a 1:1 mapping, meaning that when querying resources with an alternative identifier (instead of the 'main' identifier), the response may not be different.

name.description: The human readable name of the location.

timeZoneId.description: The time zone ID of the location according to the IANA time zone database (https://www.iana.org/time-zones), e.g. Europe/Paris. Can be used to convert UTC times in events, resources etc. back to the locations time zone while also taking daylight saving times into account.

icarBreedFractionsType.description: Defines the breeds of the animal by fraction expressed as a denominator and, for each breed, a numerator.

denominator.description: The denominator of breed fractions - for instance 16, 64, or 100.

fractions.description: The numerators of breed fractions for each breed proportion.

breed.description: The breed for this breed fraction using a scheme and id.

fraction.description: The proportion of the denominator that this breed comprises.

icarCoatColorIdentifierType.description: Coat color identifier based on a scheme and Id.

icarAnimalRelationType.description: Enumeration for parent relationships - genetic is the default, recipient and adoptive (foster) are alternatives.

icarParentageType.description: Use this type to define a parent of an animal.

parentOf.description: References the child of this parent (allowing you to build multi-generation pedigrees).

gender.description: Specifies Male or Female gender so you can recognise Sire or Dam.

relation.description: Identifies type of parent: Genetic (default), Recipient, Adoptive (Foster/Rearing).

identifier.description: Unique animal scheme and identifier combination.

icarAnimalBaseResource.description: Base schema containing all common properties for animal and progeny resources.

alternativeIdentifiers.description: Alternative identifiers for the animal. Here, also temporary identifiers, e.g. transponders or animal numbers, can be listed.

birthDate.description: RFC3339 UTC date/time of birth (see https://ijmacd.github.io/rfc3339-iso8601/ for how to use).

primaryBreed.description: ICAR Breed code for the animal.

coatColor.description: Colour of the animal's coat, using the conventions for that breed.

coatColorIdentifier.description: Colour of the animal's coat using a national or breed-defined scheme and identifier combination.

managementTag.description: The identifier used by the farmer in day to day operations. In many cases this could be the animal number.

name.description: Name given by the farmer for this animal.

productionPurpose.description: Primary production purpose for which animals are bred.

parentage.description: Parents of the animal.  The array can handle multiple generations by specifying the parent of a parent.

healthStatus.description: Health status of the animal (such as Healthy, Suspicious, Ill, InTreatment, ToBeCulled).

icarAnimalStatusType.description: Defines the status of the animal either absolutely and/or with reference to the location on which it is recorded\nOff-farm signifies that the animal is no longer recorded at the location.

icarRegistrationReasonType.description: Enumeration for registration reason: Born, or Registered (induct existing animal).

icarDeathReasonType.description: Enumeration for death reason. Not specified in previous ADE data dictionary.

icarDeathDisposalMethodType.description:
Enumeration for disposal method. Not specified in previous ADE data dictionary, required by some schemes.
 OnPremise- burial or leaving carcass on site.
 ApprovedService- collected for disposal by an approved service provider.
 Consumption- by wild animals, people on farm, or working dogs

PostalAddress.title: PostalAddress - from schema.org
PostalAddress.description: An address object from schema.org (see https://schema.org/PostalAddress).

addressCountry.description: The country. For example, USA. You can also provide the two-letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code.

addressLocality.description: The locality in which the street address is, and which is in the region. For example, Mountain View.

addressRegion.description: The region in which the locality is, and which is in the country. For example, California or another appropriate first-level Administrative division

postOfficeBoxNumber.description: The post office box number for PO box addresses.

streetAddress.description: The street address. For example, 1600 Amphitheatre Pkwy.

icarOrganizationIdentityType.description: The identity of an organization in livestock supply chains. Based on a minimal set of identifiers from schema.org/organization.

leiCode.description: An organization identifier that uniquely identifies a legal entity as defined in ISO 17442.

globalLocationNumber.description: The Global Location Number (GLN, sometimes also referred to as International Location Number or ILN) of the respective organization, person, or place. The GLN is a 13-digit number used to identify parties and physical locations.

uri.description: A uniform resource identifier that is the unique reference or for this organisation, such as its web site.

icarOrganizationIdentifierType.description: Scheme and identifier based mechanism for identifying organisations, including registered establishments and scheme memberships.

icarOrganizationType.description: Details for an organization that support its role in livestock systems or supply chains. Conceptually extends schema.org/organization.

establishmentIdentifiers.description: Scheme and identifier combinations that provide official registrations for a business or establishment

address.description: Postal address or physical address in postal format, including country. Optional as this may already be specified in a consignment.

parentOrganization.description: The larger organization that this organization is a sub-organization of, if any.

membershipIdentifiers.description: Scheme and identifier combinations that identity membership in programmes

icarInterestedPartyType.description: Identifies the interests an organization has in an entity, for example in a consignment or in a processingLot. Extends the organization object.

interests.description: Identifies the type of interest that the party has in a consignment or animal.

icarDeclarationIdentifierType.description: A scheme and ID combination that uniquely identifies a claim or declaration in an assurance programme or equivalent.

icarConsignmentDeclarationType.description: A Consignment Declaration provides a claim or declaration, usually by the source of animals, regarding the assurance or other status of animals in the consignment.

declarationId.description: Identifies the specific declaration being made using a scheme and an id.

icarConsignmentType.description: Consignment information for a movement (arrival, departure).

id.description: Official identifier for the movement.

originLocation.description: The location of the origin of the consignment expressed as a scheme and id.

originPostalAddress.description: A structured, schema.org-style address for the origin location.

originOrganization.description: The organisational details of the origin, including any necessary identifiers.

destinationLocation.description: The location of the destination of the consignment expressed as a scheme and id.

destinationPostalAddress.description: A structured, schema.org-style address for the destination location.

destinationOrganization.description: The organisational details of the destination, including any necessary identifiers.

loadingDateTime.description: RFC3339 UTC date and time animals were loaded for transport (see https://ijmacd.github.io/rfc3339-iso8601/ for format guidance).

unloadingDateTime.description: RFC3339 UTC date and time animals were unloaded after transport (see https://ijmacd.github.io/rfc3339-iso8601/ for format guidance).

expectedDuration.description: Expected duration of transportation in hours.

transportOperator.description: Transport operator official name (should really be schema.org/organization).

vehicle.description: Identification of the vehicle (for example, licence plate).

isolationFacilityUsed.description: True if an isolation facility was used for the movement.

farmAssuranceReference.description: Identification reference of a farm assurance operation.

countConsigned.description: The number of animals despatched or consigned from the origin.

countReceived.description: The number of animals received at the destination.

hoursOffFeed.description: The number of hours since animals in the consignment had access to feed.

hoursOffWater.description: The number of hours since animals in the consignment had access to water.

references.description: References associated with the consignment. These may be additional to the single transport reference (for instance, to support multi-mode transport).

interestedParties.description: Identifies the parties and their interests in the consignment.

declarations.description: Country, species or scheme -specific declarations for the consignment.

icarDeathMethodType.description:
Enumeration for method of death.
 Note: Some organisations will use Euthanized and Culled as synonyms. Culling may be euthanasia for disease control purposes.
 Culling is also used to describe live animal departures (out of this scope).

icarReasonIdentifierType.description: Extended reason identifier based on a scheme and ID.

icarArrivalReasonType.description: Enumeration for arrival reason. Not specified in previous ADE data dictionary.

currentLactationParity.description: The current parity of the animal.

icarDepartureKindType.description: Enumeration for the kind of departure. Type of destination or transfer.

icarDepartureReasonType.description: Enumeration for departure cause. Not specified in previous ADE data dictionary.

method.description: Method by which diagnosis was carried out.

foetalAge.description: Assessed age of the foetus or length of the pregnancy (in days).

foetusCount.description: If specified, contains the number of foetuses observed.

foetusCountMale.description: If specified, contains number of foetuses observed as male.

foetusCountFemale.description: If specified, contains number of foetuses observed as female.

exceptions.description: Additional local observations - such as ABNORMAL CALF

icarReproPregnancyCheckEventCollection.description: Represents a collection of animal pregnancy checks events. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case pregnancy check events.

commencementDateTime.description: RFC3339 UTC date/time when the heat will start (see https://ijmacd.github.io/rfc3339-iso8601/ for format guidance).

expirationDateTime.description: RFC3339 UTC date/time when the heat will end (see https://ijmacd.github.io/rfc3339-iso8601/ for format guidance).

visualDetection.description: Specific info when the heat was visually detected.

optimumInseminationWindow.description: Details of the optimum breeding windows

deviceHeatProbability.description: The manufacturer specific indication for the certainty of the heat

heatReportScrSenseTime.description: Specific info when the heat was detected by SenseTime from SCR

heatIndex.description: Gives an indication of the certainty of the heat indication.

heatReportNedapCowControl.description: Specific info when the heat was detected by CowControl from NEDAP

expirationDateTime.description: RFC3339 UTC date/time when the heat will end (see https://ijmacd.github.io/rfc3339-iso8601/ for format guidance).

heatChance.description: Gives an indication of the certainty of the heat indication.

device.description: Optional information about the device used for the measurement.

icarReproHeatEventCollection.description: Represents a collection of animal heat events. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case heat events.

icarReproInseminationEventResource.description: Event for recording natural or artificial insemination, including embryo transfer.

rank.description: The rank of intervention of each AI carried out within the same reproductive cycle.

sireIdentifiers.description: Unique scheme/identifier combinations for the sire, including official ID and Herdbook.

sireOfficialName.description: Official herdbook name of the sire.

sireURI.description: URI to an AnimalCoreResource for the sire.

straw.description: Details of the straw, which may also include sire details.

eventEndDateTime.description: To be used in case of running with a bull to end the period. RFC3339 UTC format (see https://ijmacd.github.io/rfc3339-iso8601/ for format guidance).

semenFromFarmStocks.description: True if the semen is from the farmer's own stocks (false if supplied by technician).

farmContainer.description: Number or ID of the container from which the dose was taken.

doItYourself.description: Only where inseminationType is `insemination`: true if farmer applied, false or not specified if by AI company.

icarReproInseminationEventCollection.description: Represents a collection of animal insemination events. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case insemination events.

icarMilkingDryOffEventResource.description: Records that the animal has been dried off from milking. If necessary, also record a separate health treatment event.
