icarMilkingDryOffEventCollection.description: Represents a collection of animal drying off events. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case weight events.

icarReproAbortionEventResource.description: The abortion event records an observation that an abortion has taken place. There are no other parameters.

icarReproAbortionEventCollection.description: Represents a collection of animal abortion events. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case abortion events.

icarReproDoNotBreedEventResource.description: The do not breed event records an observation that an animal has been assigned not to be bred. There are no other parameters.

doNotBreed.description: Set this attribute to true if the animal should not be bred, false if it may now be bred.

extendedReasons.description: Extended reason codes why this animal should not be bred.

icarReproDoNotBreedEventCollection.description: Represents a collection of do not breed events. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case do not breed events.

icarReproParturitionEventResource.description: Event for recording parturition (calving, lambing, kidding, fawning).

isEmbryoImplant.description: True if the progeny is the result of an embryo implant.

damParity.description: The calving, litter, or other parturition number for the dam

liveProgeny.description: The number of live offspring from the parturition. Important if progeny are not identified.

totalProgeny.description: The total number of offspring from the parturition, including those born dead.

calvingEase.description: Calving ease (enum corresponds to traditional 1-5 values).

progenyDetails.description: List of progeny details. May not be fully identified, but recommend that gender and status are supplied at least.

progeny.description: List of progeny. May not be fully identified, but recommend that gender and status are supplied at least.

icarReproParturitionEventCollection.description: Represents a collection of animal parturition events. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case parturition events.

icarReproMatingRecommendationCollection.description: Represents a collection of animal mating recommendation events. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case mating recommendation events.

icarGestationResource.description:
This resource holds computed or predicted gestation information for animals at a location.
- Use this resource to understand potential sire and expected calving date.
- This resource should be recomputed when a heat, repro-status observation, or pregnancy check event is recorded.

id.description: Unique identifier in the source system for this computed resource.

animal.description: Unique animal scheme and identifier combination.

sireIdentifiers.description: Unique scheme/identifier combinations for the sire, including official ID and Herdbook.

expectedCalvingDate.description: The RFC3339 UTC date the calving is expected to happen (see https://ijmacd.github.io/rfc3339-iso8601/ for format guidance).

icarGestationCollection.description: Represents a collection of gestations. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case gestations.

icarReproStatusObservedEventResource.description: This event records an observed reproductive status without necessarily a pregnancy check, parturition, or other event.

observedStatus.description: The reproductive status at the time of observation.

icarReproStatusObservedEventCollection.description: Represents a collection of animal reproductive status observation events. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case reproductive status events.

embryoCount.description: The number of embryos extracted in the flushing.

collectionCentre.description: The location where the embryo was flushed.

icarReproEmbryoFlushingEventCollection.description: Represents a collection of animal embryo flushing events. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case embryo flushing events.

icarReproHeatDetectionMethodType.description: The method of detecting the heat of an animal

icarReproHeatCertaintyType.description: The certainty of a specific heat. 'Potential' is very early in the heat cycle, e.g. first 2 hours, followed by 'Suspect', until the animal is most likely 'InHeat'.

icarReproHeatSignType.description: The signs of the heat (Slime,Clear slime,Interested in other animals,Stands under,Bawling,Blood)

icarReproHeatIntensityType.description: The intensity of the heat (Very weak,Weak,Normal,Strong,Very strong)

icarReproHeatWindowType.description: The optimum breeding window for an animal in heat

startDateTime.description: RFC3339 UTC date/time when the optimum insemination window starts (see https://ijmacd.github.io/rfc3339-iso8601/ for format guidance).

endDateTime.description: RFC3339 UTC date/time when the optimum insemination window ends (see https://ijmacd.github.io/rfc3339-iso8601/ for format guidance).

windowName.description: The name of the optimum insemination breeding window.

icarReproInseminationType.description: The method of insemination (natural service, run with bull, insemination, implantation

icarReproSemenPreservationType.description: Method of semen preservation (liquid usually with extender, frozen)

id.description: Official identifier for the straw (if any).

batch.description: Identification of the batch of semen.

dateCollected.description: RFC3339 UTC date/time of collection (see https://ijmacd.github.io/rfc3339-iso8601/ for format guidance).

sireIdentifiers.description: One or more unique scheme/identifier combinations for the sire.

sireOfficialName.description: Official herdbook name of the sire.

sireURI.description: URI to an AnimalCoreResource for the sire.

preservationType.description: The method of preservation of the semen (liquid, frozen).

isSexedSemen.description: True if this is sexed semen.

sexedGender.description: Specify Male or Female for sexed semen only.

sexedPercentage.description: Percentage of semen that are expected to be of the chosen sex (e.g. 75, 90, 95).

id.description: Official identifier for the embryo (if any).

dateCollected.description: The RFC3339 UTC date of collection (see https://ijmacd.github.io/rfc3339-iso8601/ for format guidance).

donorIdentifiers.description: One or more unique scheme/identifier combinations for the donor dam.

donorURI.description: URI to an AnimalCoreResource for the donor dam.

sireIdentifiers.description: One or more unique scheme/identifier combinations for the sire.

sireOfficialName.description: Official herdbook name of the sire.

sireURI.description: URI to an AnimalCoreResource for the sire.

icarReproCalvingEaseType.description: Enumeration for calving ease. In the order they are listed, these correspond to INTERBEEF codes 1 to 5

icarParturitionBirthStatusType.description: Enumeration for the widely used progeny birth statuses.

icarParturitionBirthSizeType.description: Enumeration for the widely used progeny birth sizes.

identifier.description: Unique animal scheme and identifier combination.

taggingDate.description: Progeny tagging date in RFC3339 UTC (see https://ijmacd.github.io/rfc3339-iso8601/ for format guidance).

icarRecommendationType.description: the type of recommendation (SireRecommended, RecommendationImpossible, BeefSire, NoBreedingSire

icarSireRecommendationType.description: Gives one possible sire recommended to use on an animal.

sireIdentifiers.description: Unique scheme/identifier combinations for the sire, including official ID and Herdbook.

sireOfficialName.description: Official herdbook name of the sire.

sireURI.description: URI to an AnimalCoreResource for the sire.

isSexedSemen.description: True if this is sexed semen.

sexedGender.description: Specify Male or Female for sexed semen only.

parity.description: The parity of the cow for which the recommendation is valid.

sireRank.description: The rank of the sire in the recommendation, 1 = first choice, 2 = second, ....

icarAnimalSortingCommandCollection.description: Represents a collection of animal-sorting-commands. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case animal sorting commands (icarAnimalSortingCommandResource).

icarSortingSiteCollection.description: Represents a collection of sites. Based on icarResourceCollection to provide paging etc.

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case sorting-sites.

icarAnimalSortingCommandResource.description: Sorting data for a specific animal on a location.

animal.description: Unique animal scheme and identifier combination.

sites.description: Array with unique site identifiers where this animal can be sorted to.

validFrom.description: Specifies from when the sort command should be active. RFC3339 UTC date time (see https://ijmacd.github.io/rfc3339-iso8601/ for format guidance).

validTo.description: Specifies until when the sort command should be active. Could be left empty, when the sorting should be ongoing (until replaced). RFC3339 UTC date time (see https://ijmacd.github.io/rfc3339-iso8601/ for format guidance).

id.description: Unique identifier in the system for this site.

name.description: Name of the site as it is known on the location.

capacity.description: The maximum capacity of this site.

default.description: An error has occured while handling the request. Check the content of the message for the error details.

location-id.description: The unique identifier for the location.

date-to.name: date-from
